Valombreuse5eGMG.Odyssey.Header.Title: Odyssey Title
Valombreuse5eGMG.Odyssey.Header.TitlePH: e.g. Odyssey XIII — The Ruins of Karthos
Valombreuse5eGMG.Odyssey.Header.Flavor: Each Odyssey records the deeds and echoes of a chapter in the Vein’s journey. These journals are fragments of living history, carved into the blood of Céphéus.
Valombreuse5eGMG.Odyssey.S1.Title: 1. Narrative Summary
Valombreuse5eGMG.Odyssey.S1.Help: Write a 5–10 line epic summary from the Vein’s collective perspective — describe the journey, the conflict, and its resolution.
Valombreuse5eGMG.Odyssey.S1.Hint: Write a 5–10 line summary told from the Vein’s collective voice. Capture the tone of myth and memory — how the journey unfolded, what was lost or learned, and what echoes remain. Focus on emotion and symbols rather than simple facts.
Valombreuse5eGMG.Odyssey.S2.Title: 2. Decisions and Consequences
Valombreuse5eGMG.Odyssey.S2.Hint: These entries allow the GM to adjust Diplomacy scores, relationships, or trigger long-term consequences.
Valombreuse5eGMG.Odyssey.S3.Title: 3. Secrets Uncovered
Valombreuse5eGMG.Odyssey.S3.Col.Name: Name / Description
Valombreuse5eGMG.Odyssey.S3.Hint: These values update the Vein’s Awakening score on its main Foundry sheet.
Valombreuse5eGMG.Odyssey.S4.Title: 4. Rewards and Consequences
Valombreuse5eGMG.Odyssey.S4.Hint: Record the tangible and intangible rewards earned by the Vein — relics recovered, alliances forged, or divine favors received. These entries may also note long-term consequences on kingdoms, factions, or individuals.
Valombreuse5eGMG.Odyssey.S5.Title: 5. Game Master Notes
Valombreuse5eGMG.Odyssey.S5.Help: A private space for the GM to record upcoming plot threads, divine omens, or adjustments to the world state. This section can be hidden from players via Foundry permissions.
Valombreuse5eGMG.Odyssey.S6.Title: 6. Odyssey Excerpt
Valombreuse5eGMG.Odyssey.S6.PH: “Blood always remembers. Even when the heart forgets.”
Valombreuse5eGMG.Odyssey.S7.Title: 7. Linked Entries
Valombreuse5eGMG.Odyssey.S7.Hint: Automatically or manually link related Foundry documents (Secrets, Powers, NPCs, Kingdoms…).
Valombreuse5eGMG.Odyssey.Name: Odyssey Name
Valombreuse5eGMG.Odysseys.DropHint: GM: Drag & drop a Journal here to attach it to the Vein.
Valombreuse5eGMG.secrets.hintDrag: Grasp a secret and let it flow… the blood never forgets.
Valombreuse5eGMG.secrets.hintDrop: Release it here, where the Vein remembers its whispers.
Valombreuse5eGMG.ui.awakeningLossHint: Represents awakening points lost through sacrifices or rituals.
